users.label: User Profiles
users.description: Profile-centric records including roles, privacy preferences, and biography variables.

posts.label: Posts
posts.description: HTML5-ready post entries with collaborators, privacy, and statistics metadata.

pages.label: Pages
pages.description: Locally managed navigation pages with visibility controls and template metadata.

settings.label: Settings
settings.description: Delegated configuration entries defining application branding and behavior.

uploads.label: Uploaded Assets
uploads.description: Metadata describing user-provided files grouped by extension for local delivery.

notifications.label: Notification Queue
notifications.description: Queued notification payloads awaiting delivery via local channels.

themes.label: Theme Definitions
themes.description: Configurable palettes applied to the interface and preview tooling.

translations.label: Translations
translations.description: Locale definitions, translation tokens, and interface strings for Filegate.

asset_configurations.label: Asset Configuration Defaults
asset_configurations.description: Metadata describing configurable parameters for each asset in the application.

asset_overrides.label: Asset Overrides
asset_overrides.description: Global, role-based, and user-specific overrides for asset configuration parameters.

asset_snapshots.label: Dataset Snapshots
asset_snapshots.description: Historical captures of dataset payloads recorded before changes are applied.

activity_log.label: Activity Log
activity_log.description: Operational history of dataset saves, restores, and administrative actions.

notification_channels.label: Notification Channels
notification_channels.description: Static definitions of email, browser, cookie, and cache delivery mechanisms.

template_options.label: Template Options
template_options.description: Available layout templates and their capabilities for posts and notifications.

editor_options.label: Editor Options
editor_options.description: Client-side editor toggles, formatting controls, and input variable defaults.

embed_providers.label: Embed Providers
embed_providers.description: Local templates that describe how recognised services and file types should render.

html5_elements.label: HTML5 Elements
html5_elements.description: Reference list of supported HTML5 elements grouped by usage.

theme_tokens.label: Theme Tokens
theme_tokens.description: Static descriptions of palette tokens and their CSS variable bindings.

notification_templates.label: Notification Templates
notification_templates.description: XML descriptors defining multi-channel notification subjects and bodies.

project_status.label: Roadmap Tracker
project_status.description: Progress records describing what is built, underway, or planned across Filegate.

feature_requests.label: Feature Requests
feature_requests.description: Member-submitted feature ideas with prioritisation, visibility, and support tracking.

polls.label: Polls
polls.description: Community polls with locally stored options, votes, and visibility rules.

knowledge_categories.label: Knowledge Categories
knowledge_categories.description: Category definitions that organise knowledge base articles for browsing and filtering.

knowledge_base.label: Knowledge Base
knowledge_base.description: Locally stored guides, how-tos, and reference articles for members and guests.

changelog.label: Changelog
changelog.description: Release notes and highlights that communicate what changed across Filegate.
